scripts.build:install: docker run --rm -v "$PWD":/var/task lambci/lambda:build-nodejs8.10 bash -c "npm i -g npm && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-optional --no-save --only=prod --build-from-source --verbose"
scripts.build:zip: docker run --rm -v "$PWD":/var/task lambci/lambda:build-nodejs8.10 bash -c "rm -f *.zip && zip lighthouse4u-lambda.zip -r config lib node_modules index.js scripts package.json"
scripts.build: npm run build:install && npm run build:zip
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:local-to-s3 && npm run deploy:s3-to-lambda
scripts.deploy:s3-to-lambda: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name LAMBDA_FUNCTION --s3-bucket DEPLOYMENT_BUCKET --s3-key deploy/lighthouse4u-lambda.zip --publish
